clientPriorities.label: Client Priorities
clientPriorities.description: Select which client priority levels can use this tool

name.label: Tool Name
name.description: Unique name for this tool (lowercase, no spaces)

description.label: Description
description.description: Detailed description of the tool's purpose and functionality

url.label: URL
url.description: The full URL where the tool will make requests

method.label: HTTP Method
method.description: HTTP method to use for requests

arguments.label: Argument
arguments.description: Configure parameters that will be sent with requests to your tool

name.label: Parameter Name
name.description: Name of the parameter (lowercase, underscore separated)

paramDescription.label: Parameter Description
paramDescription.description: Description of what this parameter is used for

location.label: Location
location.description: Where this parameter should be placed in the HTTP request

valueType.label: Value Type
valueType.description: How the value for this parameter is determined

dataType.label: Data Type
dataType.description: The data type of this parameter

constantValue.label: Constant Value
constantValue.description: The fixed value to use for this parameter

required.label: Required
required.description: Whether this parameter is required for the AI to provide

defaultValue.label: Default Value
defaultValue.description: Default value to use if the AI doesn't provide one

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether this tool is available for use

guestAccess.label: Guest Access
guestAccess.description: Allow the tool to be used by non-logged users
